uuid.description: UUID of the category for this listing.

description.description: Product description. Please keep formatting to a minimum.

has_inventory.description: Set true if selling more than one

inventory.description: Number of items available for sale. Reverb will increment and decrement automatically.

offers_enabled.description: Whether the listing accepts negotiated offers (default: true)

origin_country_code.description: Country of origin/manufacture, ISO code (e.g: US)

photos.description: An array of image URLs. Ex: ['http://my.site.com/image.jpg']

amount.description: The amount of money being expressed, as a POSIX-compliant decimal number

currency.description: The currency the money will be expressed in

seller_cost.description: Cost of goods in your currency as a POSIX-compliant decimal number (internal use only, not shown to buyers)

local.description: True if you offer local pickup

rates.description: List of shipping rates. Set to null to clear rates.

sold_as_is.description: This item is sold As-Is and cannot be returned

tax_exempt.description: Listing is exempt from taxes / VAT

upc_does_not_apply.description: True if a brand new product has no UPC code, ie for a handmade or custom item

year.description: Supports many formats. Ex: 1979, mid-70s, late 90s
